name: Easy WP Tiles
author: Vasilis Triantafyllou

sections.description:
This little plugin helps you make your life easier by creating tiles with links so you can have faster access to what you need from the wordpress dashboard.
Choose between Posts,Comments,Pages,Media,Users,Appearance,Plugins,Settings,Tools, Custom links, contact form 7 or Woocommerce boxes.

Arbitrary section 1

Thanks for using!
sections.installation:
1. Upload zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Easy Wp Tiles
  4. Check which boxes you want to show on top and you are ready!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> Easy Wp Tiles
  4. Check which boxes you want to show on top and you are ready!
